company_website.summary: KHEMIA is an environmentally conscious cannabis brand, from beyond organic, sustainable, and regenerative farming practices to compostable packaging.
company_website.infomration_about_the_team: KHEMIA offers a unique opportunity for aspiring entrepreneurs to own their own cannabis company by joining their shared facility program.
